javadoc: Common base class for tasks that need to extract files from a GFileSystem location.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: rootOutputDir
params.comment: base directory where files will be extracted to

methods.name: startExtract

params.name: fs
params.comment: the GFileSystem that holds the files

params.name: srcDir
params.comment: the starting directory to extract, if , start at root of file system

params.name: monitor
params.comment: TaskMonitor that will be updated with progress and checked for cancel

methods.name: processDirectory
methods.comment:
Extract the contents of a directory in a GFileSystem into a local file system
 directory.
 
 The destination directory is created if not present.

params.name: srcGFileDirectory
params.comment: if null, directory is filesystem root

params.name: monitor
params.comment: TaskMonitor to watch and update with progress

methods.javadoc:
Maps the untrusted, potentially hostile, filename of the source file to a name that is suitable to be used to create a file on the user's local file system.

NOTE: This base implementation converts relative directory names to spelled-out versions of that directory, eg. "." becomes "dot".

If you wish to modify this behavior, override this method and return different mappings. @param srcFile source file @return String name of the source file, possibly modified to be safer @throws IOException thrown if name is not mappable and the extract process should stop
methods.name: mapSourceFilenameToDest
methods.comment:
Maps the untrusted, potentially hostile, filename of the source file to a name
 that is suitable to be used to create a file on the user's local file system.
 
 NOTE: This base implementation converts relative directory names to spelled-out
 versions of that directory, eg. "." becomes "dot".
 
 If you wish to modify this behavior, override this method and return different
 mappings.

throws.comment: thrown if name is not mappable and the extract process should stop

return.comment: String name of the source file, possibly modified to be safer

methods.name: handleUnexpectedException
methods.comment:
Allows custom handling of exceptions that occur during file extraction.
 
 Return true if the exception should be ignored by the file extraction process,
 otherwise return false if it should be propagated up the call stack.

params.name: file
params.comment: file that was being extracted when the exception happened

return.comment:
true if the exception should be suppressed, false if the exception should
 be thrown

methods.name: getTotalFilesExportedCount
methods.comment: Return the number of files that were exported.

return.comment: the number of files that were exported

methods.name: getTotalDirsExportedCount
methods.comment: Return the number of directories that were exported.

return.comment: the number of directories that were exported

methods.name: getTotalBytesExportedCount
methods.comment: Return the number of bytes that were exported.

return.comment: the number of bytes that were exported

name: AbstractFileExtractorTask
comment: Common base class for tasks that need to extract files from a GFileSystem location.
